decks.notes: The deck focuses on a swarm of low-cost creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Novice Inspector and Thraben Inspector provide card advantage while Lunarch Veteran and Militia Bugler offer additional support. The deck includes some flying creatures like Kor Skyfisher and Eagles of the North for evasion. Spells like Thraben Charm, Guardians' Pledge, and Prismatic Strands boost the strength of the weenie creatures in combat. The deck aims to flood the board with creatures and maintain pressure on the opponent through aggressive attacks.

The deck focuses on using cheap spells and creature ETB effects to control the game. It aims to stall out the opponent with lifegain, removal, and counter spells while generating card advantage through draw spells like Deep Analysis. The key strategy involves looping Ephemerate with Archaeomancer to recur powerful spells like Mulldrifter or removal like Snuff Out. The deck also utilizes Prismatic Strands to protect from combat damage and The Modern Age to generate additional value from casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to outlast opponents and win through grinding them out of resources.
